data.eml:eml: Bombylioidea (Diptera: Bombyliidae, Mythicomyiidae) from the island of Sokotra

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Greathead, D. J., Evenhuis, N. L. (2001): Bombylioidea (Diptera: Bombyliidae, Mythicomyiidae) from the island of Sokotra. Zootaxa 14: 1-11, DOI: 10.5072/zenodo.155484
